name: Parallel Traveller (DEMO)
description:
This is a demo of a game I'm working on, the title is provisional.

More info:

Engine: this game runs on its own vanilla Javascript code, no engine!

Art & animation: All by me! drawn on Aseprite.

Music SFX: none yet :(

What will the final product be: an adventure through space(s) and time(s).
